channel.title: PLEase help ive been wondering how to do this for a long time!
channel.description: hey :cool: i was wondering , how can i rep some1 more then once.. like more at 1 time.. some 1 reped me 4 times,, how do i do that please awnser and i do it for you :D

item.title: PLEase help ive been wondering how to do this for a long time!
item.dc:creator: @Nwfd1025 Nwfd1025
item.description:
@Nwfd1025 wrote:

It is like verytime you get 15 rep you are able to rep people 1 more then before. it goes like this:

15-1
30-2
45-3
60-4
75-5
90-6
105-7
120-8
135-9
150-10

and so on.

Please do not abuse your repping powers as it could get your reset to 0

Read full topic
item.source: PLEase help ive been wondering how to do this for a long time!
